description.S1: Fergus's remains are somewhere on the outpost.

blurb.B1: The Stranger discovers Fergus's rotted corpse in the projection room of the theater,
blurb.B2: watching Titus Androidicus still playing on a loop.
blurb.B3: In addition to his personal effects,
blurb.B4: the player finds Nolan's final letter.
blurb.B5: In it Nolan calls out Fergus as the traitor,
blurb.B7: He knows the loyalist movement would be destroyed by Fergus's betrayal and his reputation ruined.
blurb.B8: As an act of devotion Nolan offered to make him a martyr.
blurb.B9: All Fergus had to do was come to the theater.
blurb.B10: There, Nolan assassinated him and claimed it was the last act of the desperate revolutionaries.
blurb.B11: Fergus had to die for his crimes,
blurb.B12: but he would die a hero to the cause he betrayed - Fearless Fergus.
blurb.B14: the loyalists were able to successfully execute their plan to depressurize the base and end the fighting.

blurb.B3: She is understandably troubled by what has been discovered.
blurb.B4: The Stranger must then help Clara decide what to do with her family secrets.
blurb.B5: They can choose to conceal the truth -
blurb.B6: she has enough to make a movie about Fergus
blurb.B8: and keep the myth of his heroism alive.
blurb.B9: She's aware that if she does this she'll really be continuing Nolan's script,
blurb.B10: which she has some qualms about.
blurb.B11: On one hand, he was the real loyalist and loved her uncle.
blurb.B12: On the other hand, he's a dead hack and she has a career to advance.
blurb.B13: Or, they can choose to reveal the truth -
blurb.B14: she has evidence to destroy the myth of Uncle Fergus,
blurb.B15: but will undoubtedly lose her job at Odeon in the process
blurb.B17: On the other hand, truth matters (right?)
blurb.B18: and maybe she can get a job as an investigative journalist at the Halcyon Observer.
blurb.B19: That's practically the same thing as a script writer,
blurb.B20: and with her youth and vigor,
blurb.B21: those old media hacks won't know what hit 'em.

dialog.speaker: Clara Ryan
dialog.utterance: If it isn't my favorite semi-legal Odeon subcontractor.  Any updates on my uncle?
